title: old rift
body:
I think that there should be a game mode were  old players get to experience the old summoners rift along with new players who have never seen it. this game mode should contain all of the original summoners spells eg (revive, clarity eg)  I hope this is added into the game and look forward to it possibly happening. is it possible for this to happen in the future???
it would be really cool if it does happen{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: Problem is they would have to completely remake it due to the new client update which is why they taking so long with hexakill and one for all
im sure that they would have the coding and design of the old map saved somewhere
